info.title: Schema of Web events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Web events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

AppAction.description: Type of action of the operation

values.name: ChangedAppSettings
values.description: There was an operation to change app setting on the web app.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The job has failed to complete.

AppEventTypeDetail.description: Detail of action on the app.

action.description: Type of action of the operation.

AppServicePlanAction.description: Type of action on the app service plan.

values.name: Updated
values.description: App Service plan is being updated.

AppServicePlanEventTypeDetail.description: Detail of action on the app service plan.

stampKind.description: Kind of environment where app service plan is.

action.description: Type of action on the app service plan.

status.description: Asynchronous operation status of the operation on the app service plan.

AsyncStatus.description: Asynchronous operation status of the operation on the app service plan.

StampKind.description: Kind of environment where app service plan is.

values.name: Public
values.description: App Service Plan is running on a public stamp.

values.name: AseV1
values.description: App Service Plan is running on an App Service Environment V1.

values.name: AseV2
values.description: App Service Plan is running on an App Service Environment V2.

WebAppServicePlanUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Web.AppServicePlanUpdated event.

appServicePlanEventTypeDetail.description: Detail of action on the app service plan.

name.description: name of the app service plan that had this event.

clientRequestId.description: The client request id generated by the app service for the app service plan API operation that triggered this event.

correlationRequestId.description: The correlation request id generated by the app service for the app service plan API operation that triggered this event.

requestId.description: The request id generated by the app service for the app service plan API operation that triggered this event.

address.description: HTTP request URL of this operation.

name.description: name of app service plan sku.

Tier.description: tier of app service plan sku.

Size.description: size of app service plan sku.

Family.description: family of app service plan sku.

Capacity.description: capacity of app service plan sku.

WebAppUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Web.AppUpdated event.

appEventTypeDetail.description: Detail of action on the app.

name.description: name of the web site that had this event.

clientRequestId.description: The client request id generated by the app service for the site API operation that triggered this event.

correlationRequestId.description: The correlation request id generated by the app service for the site API operation that triggered this event.

requestId.description: The request id generated by the app service for the site API operation that triggered this event.

address.description: HTTP request URL of this operation.
